channel.title: (614) ;;request code
channel.description:
If anyone could help me, or link me, or anything, it would be greatly appreciated and I will give you FULL credits. I'm currently trying to help out an owner of a largely big server, (500+) and I am only a moderator. I'd hope to exceed by helping out with coding.
P.S: If this wasn't clear enough, its a command that sends a message to all staff members if a player needs help, if you can some 20 second intervals for players to use the ;;request command would be fantastic!!
Any help is [b]GREATLY[/b] appreciated!
Thanks! Ags pure

item.title: (614) ;;request code
item.dc:creator: @A_G_S_P_U_R_E A G S P U R E
item.description:
@A_G_S_P_U_R_E wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:438534”]Something simple like this.

		for(Player pl : World.getPlayers()) {
		if(pl == null) continue;
			if(p.getRights() > 0) {
			
			}
		}

You will have to figure out the rest yourself, I spoonfed enough.[/quote]
Ah, I have no idea what that is. I’m not too good with coding things. Thanks for your help though!

Read full topic

item.description:

It’s a server named Fatality 614, or another server named Legacy 614, they are both just basic 614 servers. Sorry for the lack of information.
